justification: Proposal centers on A’s upgrade with little modeling of B’s beliefs. B needs wins now, values high-upside dual-threat QBs, and trusts consensus—trading away Tier 2 Chris Adams for Tier 4 Isaiah Lee plus an injured committee RB doesn’t fit B’s incentives. A already has a stable Tier 2 pocket passer (David Nelson) and prefers pocket QBs, making the target somewhat misaligned. The offer is feasible roster-wise but unlikely to be accepted. Rationale is generic and omits B’s motivations or player context.
